svg.content: <mxGraphModel dx="2385" dy="1081" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="0" pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" pageHeight="1169" math="0" shadow="0"><root><mxCell id="0"/><mxCell id="1" parent="0"/><mxCell id="7" style="edgeStyle=none;html=1;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="3" target="4"><mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="8" value="根源" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];" vertex="1" connectable="0" parent="7"><mxGeometry x="0.2024" y="4" relative="1" as="geometry"><mxPoint as="offset"/></mxGeometry></mxCell><object label="事实" 既有性="客观性" id="3"><mxCell style="swimlane;" vertex="1" parent="1"><mxGeometry x="-760" y="60" width="420" height="410" as="geometry"/></mxCell></object><mxCell id="11" value="确认" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="3"><mxGeometry x="30" y="150" width="100" height="50" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="12" value="分类" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="3"><mxGeometry x="40" y="50" width="80" height="60" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="9" style="edgeStyle=none;html=1;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="4" target="6"><mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"><mxPoint x="350" y="190" as="targetPoint"/></mxGeometry></mxCell><mxCell id="10" value="表达/付诸" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];" vertex="1" connectable="0" parent="9"><mxGeometry x="0.1434" relative="1" as="geometry"><mxPoint as="offset"/></mxGeometry></mxCell><mxCell id="4" value="观念" style="swimlane;" vertex="1" parent="1"><mxGeometry x="-170" y="50" width="480" height="480" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="16" value="真相" style="swimlane;" vertex="1" parent="4"><mxGeometry x="10" y="80" width="390" height="320" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="18" value="分类" style="swimlane;" vertex="1" parent="16"><mxGeometry x="10" y="50" width="170" height="160" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="13" value="本体" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="18"><mxGeometry x="10" y="40" width="80" height="50" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="17" value="逻辑" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="18"><mxGeometry x="70" y="90" width="80" height="50" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="20" value="确认" style="swimlane;" vertex="1" parent="16"><mxGeometry x="210" y="50" width="170" height="160" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="21" value="符合论" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="20"><mxGeometry x="10" y="40" width="80" height="50" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="6" value="语言" style="swimlane;" vertex="1" parent="1"><mxGeometry x="490" y="50" width="400" height="410" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="14" value="模糊" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="6"><mxGeometry x="10" y="60" width="90" height="60" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="15" value="多义" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="6"><mxGeometry x="10" y="130" width="90" height="60" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="23" value="直接" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="6"><mxGeometry x="290" y="60" width="90" height="60" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="24" value="完整" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="6"><mxGeometry x="290" y="140" width="90" height="60" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="25" value="区分观念与事实" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="6"><mxGeometry x="280" y="210" width="110" height="50" as="geometry"/></mxCell><mxCell id="26" value="根据对象选择语言" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="6"><mxGeometry x="280" y="270" width="110" height="50" as="geometry"/></mxCell></root></mxGraphModel>
